snippet.title: Village Cult - Horror Game Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3072870/Village_Cult/

Discord -  https://discord.gg/efdgKXQMgH
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/1071368974089867
Twitter - https://twitter.com/david_rudoj

About the game

The events take place in a small Soviet forest village. The main character will inherit a house from his moms. Arriving there to live, the main character realizes that not everything is right with his neighbors. However, he soon realizes that everything is much worse and that all the villagers are members of a bloody cult. And the player will have to get out of this satanic village without becoming their victim.
